entry.title: LocalTunnel - Expose local web server to the world

div.p: How many times did you hope there was a quick way to show the changes to your client quickly. Well LocalTunnel does exactly that.

entry.title: Convore - A modern take on IRC

div.p: Convore.com is latest entry in the realm of web based chat systems. While there are many others(Campfire, StackOverflow Chat, TinyChat etc.), Convore really is the first chat service that hits the sweet spot between IRC and web based chat service.

entry.title: argparse - Command line option and argument parsing

div.p: The argparse module was added to Python 2.7 as a replacement for optparse. The implementation of argparse supports features that would not have been easy to add to optparse, and that would have required backwards-incompatible API changes, so a new module was brought into the library instead. optparse is still supported, but is not likely to receive new features.
